definition: plain/informal/suitable/convenient/opportune/to urinate or defecate/equivalent to 就[jiu4]: then/in that case/even if/soon afterwards

sentences.english: France said that the batterer is dressed in plain clothes security personnel in Iran.
sentences.chinese: 法國方面稱，打人者是身着便衣的伊朗安全人員。

sentences.english: Followed by plainclothes police and reporters will be pulled into the roller shutter door entertainment city.
sentences.chinese: 隨後便衣民警和記者將捲簾門拉起進入了遊樂城。

sentences.english: How did the pick-pocket spot the plain-clothes cop in the woman's disguise?
sentences.chinese: 小偷怎麼識別出裝扮成女人的便衣差人？
那一定是一個便衣警察。

sentences.english: Most of the time, however, deep patrolling was undertaken by plainclothes platoons.
sentences.chinese: 但多數時候，深入偵察是在便衣排掌控之下。

sentences.english: The next day, two men in plain clothes arrived to pick up Helmut.
sentences.chinese: 第二天，兩個身着便衣的人來吧海姆特抓走了。

sentences.english: A group of plainclothes police go into the house.
sentences.chinese: 一組便衣警察進入住宅。

sentences.english: Plain clothes policeman who work undercover to detect crime.
sentences.chinese: 隱蔽調查犯罪的便衣警察。

sentences.english: I was leaving work when I was ambushed by several plainclothes police.
sentences.chinese: 我下班時被幾個便衣警察襲擊。

sentences.english: Then, plainclothes police took me here.
sentences.chinese: 然後，便衣警察就把我帶到了這裏。

sentences.english: The policeman went among the villagers in disguise and saw if there were straws in the wind.
sentences.chinese: 警察穿着便衣到村民中查訪，看看是否有蛛絲馬跡。

sentences.english: The fourth truth is " Mopping up plain - clothed soldiers was a battle action."
sentences.chinese: 第四個真相是，“掃蕩便衣士兵是戰爭行爲。”

sentences.english: Plain-clothes policemen had been planted at all the exits.
sentences.chinese: 所有的出口處都佈置了便衣警察。

sentences.english: Even clergymen visiting the area had to be accompanied by plainclothes policemen.
sentences.chinese: 甚至牧師到這裏來都要便衣警察的陪同。

sentences.english: Superiors would evaluate a plainclothes man on his dependability.
sentences.chinese: 上級評價一個便衣人員的標準，是看他是否忠誠可靠。

sentences.english: A policeman with plain clothes stood a dozen paces behind me watching me.
sentences.chinese: 穿便衣的警察站在我後面十幾步遠的地方，監視着我。

definition: SWAT (Special Weapons And Tactics)/riot police/abbr. for 特種警察|特种警察[te4 zhong3 jing3 cha2]
abbr. for 刑事警察[xing2 shi4 jing3 cha2]/criminal police
to patrol/policeman (in China's former foreign concessions)
variant of 執勤|执勤[zhi2 qin2]
